mapper.insert: insert into t_course (course_id, course_name, major_name, describe, study_time, is_delete, create_by, create_at) values (#{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{courseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
